name: Flappy Run - Impossible Tiny Jump-y Bird Adventure Racing Multiplayer Free by Top Crazy Games
name_original: Flappy Run - Impossible Tiny Jump-y Bird Adventure Racing Multiplayer Free by Top Crazy Games
description:
*** BEWARE: TOO MUCH FUN IS COMING ***

Who's ready for the new Flappy challenge? NOW ON YOUR FEET! This addicting and challenging gameplay will make you run for hours! Families and kids love it!

Play Flappy Run - Impossible Tiny Jumpy Bird Adventure Racing Multiplayer Free now on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch

Guide Flappy Feet through a retro atmosphere ***VERY NOSTALGIC*** and get the BEST distance possible! BUT THERE'S A CATCH: You will need to avoid crazy obstacles as you run, dodge, and jump

The little guys are cleaning up so. WATCH OUT FOR THE FLAME or you will be ROAST CHICKEN or bird. That works.

Flappy Feet has limited life chances so cover a maximum distance as quickly as possible and set a new record on the global gamecenter leaderboard.

Challenge your friends through Multiplayer.

FEATURES:
- Nextpeer Multiplayer
- Beautiful retina graphics!.
- Amazing animations and sound
- Use intuitive touch gestures to to guide Flappy Feet
- Universal game that works on 4S, 5/5S, iPad, and iPod Touch.

PLEASE NOTE:
- Flappy Run - Impossible Tiny Jumpy Bird Adventure Racing Multiplayer Free is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to lock out in app purchasing.
and..... more to come!

Enjoy!
